statements: DELETE FROM energy_transactions_history WHERE energy_consumer = 'ConsumerABC' AND energy_amount > 100;
DELETE FROM energy_transactions_history WHERE energy_provider = 'ABC Energy' AND energy_consumer = 'XYZ Power'
DELETE FROM energy_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND client_id = 2001;
DELETE FROM energy_transaction_history WHERE history_id = 5001 AND DATE(transaction_date) = '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM energy_consumers WHERE consumer_name = 'ABC Energy' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM energy_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE event_type = 'refund' AND event_date <= '2022-02-28';
